verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329>Musician<s%>, A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>. I <S%H6960>waited<s%> <S%H6960>patiently<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; and he <S%H5186>inclined<s%> unto me, and <S%H8085>heard<s%> my <S%H7775>cry<s%>. I waited: Heb. In waiting I waited

He brought me <S%H5927>up<s%> also out of an <S%H7588>horrible<s%> <S%H953>pit<s%>, out of the <S%H3121>miry<s%> <S%H2916>clay<s%>, and <S%H6965>set<s%> my <S%H7272>feet<s%> upon a <S%H5553>rock<s%>, and <S%H3559>established<s%> my <S%H838>goings<s%>. an: Heb. a pit of noise

And he hath <S%H5414>put<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H7892>song<s%> in my <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, even <S%H8416>praise<s%> unto our <S%H430>God<s%>: <S%H7227>many<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> it, and <S%H3372>fear<s%>, and shall <S%H982>trust<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

<S%H835>Blessed<s%> is that <S%H1397>man<s%> that <S%H7760>maketh<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> his <S%H4009>trust<s%>, and <S%H6437>respecteth<s%> not the <S%H7295>proud<s%>, nor such as turn <S%H7750>aside<s%> to <S%H3577>lies<s%>.

<S%H7227>Many<s%>, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%>, are thy <S%H6381>wonderful<s%> works which thou hast <S%H6213>done<s%>, and thy <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> which are to us-ward: they cannot be reckoned up in <S%H6186>order<s%> unto thee: if I would <S%H5046>declare<s%> and <S%H1696>speak<s%> of them, they are <S%H6105>more<s%> than can be <S%H5608>numbered<s%>. they cannot: or, none can order them unto thee

<S%H2077>Sacrifice<s%> and <S%H4503>offering<s%> thou didst not <S%H2654>desire<s%>; mine <S%H241>ears<s%> hast thou <S%H3738>opened<s%>: burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> and sin <S%H2401>offering<s%> hast thou not <S%H7592>required<s%>. opened: Heb. digged
Then <S%H559>said<s%> I, Lo, I <S%H935>come<s%>: in the <S%H4039>volume<s%> of the <S%H5612>book<s%> it is <S%H3789>written<s%> of me,
I <S%H2654>delight<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> thy <S%H7522>will<s%>, O my <S%H430>God<s%>: yea, thy <S%H8451>law<s%> is <S%H8432>within<s%> my <S%H4578>heart<s%>. within: Heb. in the midst of my bowels

I have <S%H1319>preached<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> in the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H6951>congregation<s%>: lo, I have not <S%H3607>refrained<s%> my <S%H8193>lips<s%>, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, thou <S%H3045>knowest<s%>.

I have not <S%H3680>hid<s%> thy <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> <S%H8432>within<s%> my <S%H3820>heart<s%>; I have <S%H559>declared<s%> thy <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> and thy <S%H8668>salvation<s%>: I have not <S%H3582>concealed<s%> thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> and thy <S%H571>truth<s%> from the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H6951>congregation<s%>.

<S%H3607>Withhold<s%> not thou thy tender <S%H7356>mercies<s%> from me, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: let thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> and thy <S%H571>truth<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%> <S%H5341>preserve<s%> me.

For <S%H4557>innumerable<s%> <S%H7451>evils<s%> have <S%H661>compassed<s%> me about: mine <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> have taken <S%H5381>hold<s%> upon me, so that I am not <S%H3201>able<s%> to look <S%H7200>up<s%>; they are <S%H6105>more<s%> than the <S%H8185>hairs<s%> of mine <S%H7218>head<s%>: therefore my <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H5800>faileth<s%> me. falleth: Heb. forsaketh
Be <S%H7521>pleased<s%>, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> me: O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, make <S%H2363>haste<s%> to <S%H5833>help<s%> me.

Let them be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> and <S%H2659>confounded<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> that <S%H1245>seek<s%> after my <S%H5315>soul<s%> to <S%H5595>destroy<s%> it; let them be <S%H5472>driven<s%> <S%H268>backward<s%> and put to <S%H3637>shame<s%> that <S%H2655>wish<s%> me <S%H7451>evil<s%>.
Let them be <S%H8074>desolate<s%> for a <S%H6118>reward<s%> of their <S%H1322>shame<s%> that <S%H559>say<s%> unto me, <S%H1889>Aha<s%>, <S%H1889>aha<s%>.

Let all those that <S%H1245>seek<s%> thee <S%H7797>rejoice<s%> and be <S%H8055>glad<s%> in thee: let such as <S%H157>love<s%> thy <S%H8668>salvation<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%>, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> be <S%H1431>magnified<s%>.

But I am <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H34>needy<s%>; yet the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H2803>thinketh<s%> upon me: thou art my <S%H5833>help<s%> and my <S%H6403>deliverer<s%>; make no <S%H309>tarrying<s%>, O my <S%H430>God<s%>.
